extension.name: Social Bar
extension.author: Creative Pulse
extension.description: Shows links that help users connect with the website through email, rss feeds, social networks.

field.name: default_link_type
field.label: Default link type
field.description: Sets the default link for the social bookmark networks. If -Custom URL- is chosen, you need to enter a custom URL at the -Default custom URL- field. In most options the default link can be overriden with the parameter -url-.

field.name: default_custom_url
field.label: Default custom URL
field.description: The default link for the social bookmark networks. This setting takes effect when the field -Default link type- is set to -Custom URL-.

field.name: custom1
field.label: Custom 1
field.description: Custom element. Write in HTML. Use [LINK] for the link and [TITLE] for the title of the linked page.

field.name: start_y
field.label: Opening Y position
field.description: Height from the top, in pixels, where the bar must appear in the opening of the page.

field.name: min_y
field.label: Minimum Y position
field.description: Minimum height from the top, in pixels, where the bar must appear when the user scrolls down the page.

field.name: layout
field.label: Layout
field.description: The layout viewer mechanism for the module. The layouts Custom1-5 are placeholders for custom made layouts through the template.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
